pong formula:
Formula: starts predicting the ball when it is ≪((difficulty + 1) ** 3 * 0.8)% size of the board≫ close to you.
The 'wall' difficulty also returns in the midfield, and has never conceded a point.
pop up:
Hello. I've made some shortcuts, and found them really useful so...

CTRL + P => goes to your profile editor
CTRL + P at your profile editor => goes to your public profile
CTRL + E => disconnect you
CTRL + Enter => selects the Chat
CTRL + K => selects the profile... reasearch... thing... at the top left
CTRL + (left || right) arrow => move between navigation buttons
? => shows this menu

Shoutout to the default shortcuts
alt + (left || right) arrow => navigate history
tab && shift + tab => select elements
NOT_RECOGNIZED: The glorious backend said you are not connected, sorry
NOT_IN_DB: You are not present in the db, got disconnected

ALPHANUMERIC_: [[0]] can have only letters, digits and underscores
MAX_BYTE_LENGTH: [[0]] must be at most [[1]] bytes long
MAX_STR_LENGTH: [[0]] must be at most [[1]] chars long
MIN_STR_LENGTH: [[0]] must be at least [[1]] chars long

INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: something went wrong on our side, sorry UwU
